channel.title: Greece on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Greece on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Greece biscuit factory fire leaves at least four dead
item.description: A search is continuing for one person still missing after a blaze broke out at a biscuit factory near the city of Trikala.

item.title: Biscuit factory explosion in Greece kills at least four
item.description: An overnight explosion at a biscuit factory in Trikala, Greece, has killed at least four workers.
